mapper.insert: INSERT savefood ( food_seq, saveplace_seq, member_seq, savefood_name, savefood_quantity, savefood_expi_date, insert_date, is_delete) VALUES (#{foodSeq}, #{saveplaceSeq}, #{memberSeq}, #{savefoodName}, #{savefoodQuantity}, #{savefoodExpiDate}, now(), 'N');
mapper.select: SELECT food_seq, food_name, food_expi_date FROM food WHERE food_seq = #{foodSeq} AND is_delete = 'N';

SELECT food.food_seq, food.food_name, food.food_expi_date, food.food_img, category.category_seq, category.category_name, category.ord FROM food as food LEFT JOIN category as category ON food.category_seq = category.category_seq WHERE food.is_delete = 'N' ORDER BY category.ord, food.food_name;
